edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.prefs

Class PreferenceGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.prefs.PreferenceGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

    public class PreferenceGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

    Represents a group of related preferences.

    PreferenceGroups are arranged in a tree structure; if one PreferenceGroup relates to a more specific subset of the category of preferences that another PreferenceGroup relates to, the first PreferenceGroup should be the child of the second.

    New PreferenceGroups can only be created as children of existing PreferenceGroups, with the addNewChild(String) method; there is a singleton root that serves as the parent of any PreferenceGroups that don't have a logical ancestor.
